description: Featuring the ability to transfer multi channel digital audio and uncompressed high definition video in resolutions as high as 1440p with a single cable, HDMI has quickly become the latest industry standard for delivering unsurpassed quality. This HDMI to Mini HDMI cable is perfect for hooking up your camcorder or digital camera to your HDTV or any other device featuring a HDMI connection. HDMI is renowned for its ability to deliver crisp high definition audio and video, which remains unrivalled by other conventional cables. HDMI cables will also eliminate clutter, doing the job of several cables with only one. This 15ft cable is certified version 1.3a category 2, allowing it to carry 16 bit color, equivalent to around 280 trillion colors. This helps eliminate banding in images on the screen, allowing for a smoother and more lifelike image. Featuring 24K Gold connectors for maximum conductivity and sturdy construction, this cable is certain to heighten your entertainment experience.
title: HDMI to Mini HDMI Cable 15 feet
